articles.description: Background Extensive evidence links higher body mass index (BMI) to higher odds of depression in people of European ancestry. However, our understanding of the relationship across different settings and ancestries is limited. Here, we test the relationship be…

articles.title: Beyoncé announces 2023 Renaissance tour including 3 Canadian shows - CBC News
